questions.generic:
[INST] <<SYS>>
CONTEXT: In 2023 a new president was appointed: Ajay Banga. His term began on 2 June 2023. He was supported by the American president Joe Biden partly because he supports climate action. He is also expected to help low-income countries deal with debts. He is the first Indian American to lead the bank. He worked before as the head of Mastercard. The former president David Malpass faced criticism as he challenged the scientific consensus on climate change.

Using the CONTEXT above, Answer with the name only.
<</SYS>>

The chairperson of World Bank is [/INST]
